sentences.en: But once again, the dumb head is the experimenter, not the subject.
sentences.cn: 但又一次, 愚蠢的是实验者, 而非实验对象.

sentences.en: During training, experimenter gave subjects feedback according to their performance and discussed with them.
sentences.cn: 训练时, 主试根据被试反应给予反馈,并与之讨论.

sentences.en: Even so, on experimenter can predict which of the remaining fragments will be cloned.
sentences.cn: 即使如此, 任何实验工作者仍不能预料剩下的片段中哪个将无性繁殖.

sentences.en: Experimenter can imitate the process, the preparation of the more graphic function.
sentences.cn: 实验者可以模仿本程序, 编写更多的图形函数.

sentences.en: Most people cannot connect their changed thought or behaviour with experimenter's manipulation.
sentences.cn: 很多人不能将他们思想和行为的改变同主试的控制联系起来.

sentences.en: She was an inveterate experimenter in these things.
sentences.cn: 不分青红皂白都要先试为快.

sentences.en: The automatic analysis may be helped by interaction with the experimenter.
sentences.cn: 自动分析也可因实验者的参与而得到帮助.

sentences.en: The automatic analysis may be helped withinteraction of the experimenter.
sentences.cn: 自动分析也可因实验者的参予而得到帮助.

sentences.en: The error probability is specified by the experimenter.
sentences.cn: 错误可能性由实验者指定.

sentences.en: The experimenter said “Look at my toy!
sentences.cn: 试验者对孩子说：“看看我的玩具！

sentences.en: The experimenter sucked up 20 cc of acid into a pipette.
sentences.cn: 这位试验者将20毫升的酸液吸入吸量管中.

sentences.en: The experimenter then changed the consequences of responding to the color of the flash.
sentences.cn: 实验者然后改变对闪光的颜色做出反应的结果.

sentences.en: The pull we all feel to please the experimenter, to fit in with the situation, to do what is expected of us.
sentences.cn: 我们都会受到一种拉力，它让我们想要讨好实验者，融入情境中，做别人期待我们去做的事情。

sentences.en: They were all confederates who had been told by the experimenter to give the wrong answer.
sentences.cn: 他们都是同伙,之前被实验者嘱咐故意给出错误的答案.

sentences.en: When asking experimenter if they should stop, they were instructed to continue.
sentences.cn: 当老师们问实验者他们是否应该适可而止, 他们被要求继续这样做.

sentences.en: With a second group of children, the experimenter acted differently.
sentences.cn: 对于第二组孩子，试验者采取的方法不同。
